name: minimal-webpack-project
NOTE: All version and time stamp properties are updated automatically (see `util-update-build-props.sh`, `util-increment-version.sh`)!

scripts.postinstall-publish-submodule-UNUSED: echo --Install publish submodule-- && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/300523-artiface-dist.git publish && git rm --cached -f publish
scripts.postinstall-UNUSED: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm run -s postinstall-publish-submodule
scripts.stylelint: echo --Styles linting-- && stylelint src/**/*.{css,pcss} --syntax scss && echo No styles problems found
scripts.eslint: echo --JS source code linting-- && eslint src --ext .js && echo No code problems found
scripts.lint: echo --Lint all sources-- && npm-run-all stylelint eslint
scripts.jest-clear-cache: echo --Clear jest cache-- && jest --clearCache && echo Ok
scripts.webpack-clear-cache: echo --Clear webpack cache-- && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && echo Ok
scripts.test: echo --Run all lintings and tests-- && npm-run-all lint jest
scripts.publish-UNUSED: echo --Publish build-- && ( test -d build || npm run -s build ) && cd publish && git pull && rm -Rf * && cp -Rfu ../build/* . && git add . -Av && git commit -am "auto-commit" && git push && cd ..
scripts.webpack-stats-analyze-dev: echo --Analyze webpack stats-- && npm run -s webpack-stats && webpack-bundle-analyzer .webpack-stats.json build-dev
scripts.webpack-stats-analyze: echo --Analyze webpack stats-- && npm run -s webpack-stats && webpack-bundle-analyzer .webpack-stats.json build
scripts.build-dev-watch: echo --Build development demo and watch changes-- && webpack --mode development --watch
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
